## IPopupProps interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IPopupProps extends ViewProps 
```
<b>Extends:</b> ViewProps

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [autoFocus](./react-native-windows.ipopupprops.autofocus.md) | boolean | Sets whether the Popup will automatically receive focus when opened. Defaults to true. Always true when isLightDismissEnabled === true. |
|  [horizontalOffset](./react-native-windows.ipopupprops.horizontaloffset.md) | number |  |
|  [isLightDismissEnabled](./react-native-windows.ipopupprops.islightdismissenabled.md) | boolean | Configures the Popup with a transparent backdrop. |
|  [isOpen](./react-native-windows.ipopupprops.isopen.md) | boolean |  |
|  [onDismiss](./react-native-windows.ipopupprops.ondismiss.md) | () =&gt; void |  |
|  [target](./react-native-windows.ipopupprops.target.md) | React.ReactNode | Sets a React element to use as an anchor point. When set, the popup will be positioned relative to it. |
|  [verticalOffset](./react-native-windows.ipopupprops.verticaloffset.md) | number |  |
